trans-unit.source: Monitor a SharePoint site with Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Monitor a SharePoint site with Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Start monitoring a new application with a new instrumentation key
trans-unit.target: Start monitoring a new application with a new instrumentation key

trans-unit.source: Monitor a SharePoint site with Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Monitor a SharePoint site with Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio Application Insights monitors the availability, performance and usage of your apps.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Application Insights monitors the availability, performance and usage of your apps.

trans-unit.source: Here you'll learn how to set it up for a SharePoint site.
trans-unit.target: Here you'll learn how to set it up for a SharePoint site.

trans-unit.source: Create an Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: Create an Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com), create a new Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com), create a new Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Choose ASP.NET as the application type.
trans-unit.target: Choose ASP.NET as the application type.

trans-unit.source: Click Properties, select the key, and press ctrl+C
trans-unit.target: Click Properties, select the key, and press ctrl+C

trans-unit.source: The blade that opens is the place where you'll see performance and usage data about your app.
trans-unit.target: The blade that opens is the place where you'll see performance and usage data about your app.

trans-unit.source: To get back to it next time you login to Azure, you should find a tile for it on the start screen.
trans-unit.target: To get back to it next time you login to Azure, you should find a tile for it on the start screen.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively click Browse to find it.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively click Browse to find it.

trans-unit.source: Add our script to your web pages
trans-unit.target: Add our script to your web pages

trans-unit.source: In Quick Start, get the script for web pages:
trans-unit.target: In Quick Start, get the script for web pages:

trans-unit.source: Insert the script just before the </head> tag of every page you want to track.
trans-unit.target: Insert the script just before the </head> tag of every page you want to track.

trans-unit.source: If your website has a master page, you can put the script there.
trans-unit.target: If your website has a master page, you can put the script there.

trans-unit.source: For example, in an ASP.NET MVC project, you'd put it in View\Shared\_Layout.cshtml
trans-unit.target: For example, in an ASP.NET MVC project, you'd put it in View\Shared\_Layout.cshtml

trans-unit.source: The script contains the instrumentation key that directs the telemetry to your Application Insights resource.
trans-unit.target: The script contains the instrumentation key that directs the telemetry to your Application Insights resource.

trans-unit.source: Add the code to your site pages
trans-unit.target: Add the code to your site pages

trans-unit.source: On the master page
trans-unit.target: On the master page

trans-unit.source: If you can edit the site's master page, that will provide monitoring for every page in the site.
trans-unit.target: If you can edit the site's master page, that will provide monitoring for every page in the site.

trans-unit.source: Check out the master page and edit it using SharePoint Designer or any other editor.
trans-unit.target: Check out the master page and edit it using SharePoint Designer or any other editor.

trans-unit.source: Add the code just before the
trans-unit.target: Add the code just before the

trans-unit.source: tag.
trans-unit.target: tag.

trans-unit.source: Or on individual pages
trans-unit.target: Or on individual pages

trans-unit.source: To monitor a limited set of pages, add the script separately to each page.
trans-unit.target: To monitor a limited set of pages, add the script separately to each page.

trans-unit.source: Insert a web part and embed the code snippet in it.
trans-unit.target: Insert a web part and embed the code snippet in it.

trans-unit.source: View data about your app
trans-unit.target: View data about your app

trans-unit.source: Redeploy your app.
trans-unit.target: Redeploy your app.

trans-unit.source: Return to your application blade in the [Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Return to your application blade in the [Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: The first events will appear in Diagnostic Search.
trans-unit.target: The first events will appear in Diagnostic Search.

trans-unit.source: Click Refresh after a few seconds if you're expecting more data.
trans-unit.target: Click Refresh after a few seconds if you're expecting more data.

trans-unit.source: **Usage analytics** link to charts of users, sessions and page views:
trans-unit.target: **Usage analytics** link to charts of users, sessions and page views:

trans-unit.source: For example, click Page Views to see more details:
trans-unit.target: For example, click Page Views to see more details:

trans-unit.source: Click through Users to see details about new users and their locations.
trans-unit.target: Click through Users to see details about new users and their locations.

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.source: [Web tests](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) to monitor the availability of your site.
trans-unit.target: [Web tests](app-insights-monitor-web-app-availability.md) to monitor the availability of your site.

trans-unit.source: [Application Insights](app-insights-get-started.md) for other types of app.
trans-unit.target: [Application Insights](app-insights-get-started.md) for other types of app.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
